text: Thank you for your hard work and dedication. Your efforts do not go unnoticed!
I really appreciate your commitment and the quality of work you deliver. Keep it up!
Your contributions to the team are invaluable. Thank you for always going above and beyond.

column3: [Name]! Wishing you a fantastic day filled with happiness and joy.

text: Many happy returns of the day
column3: [Name]! May your year be full of success and wonderful moments.

text: Happy Birthday! May all your dreams and wishes come true today and always.

column3: [Name]! Wishing you many more years of love and happiness.

text: Congratulations on your anniversary! May your love continue to grow stronger each day.
Thank you so much for your help and support. It means a lot to me.
I appreciate your kindness and assistance. Thank you for being there.
